item.title: Making an item unwearable to reg players [delta]
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Here, try reading a little bit of this. You’ll have a better understanding of what I said.

http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html

For example…

Yours:

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2){
          sM("narb why do you have a p ring!");
           removeAllItems();
            return false;
}

Conventions:

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2) {
     sM("narb why do you have a p ring!");
     removeAllItems();
     return false;
}

Read full topic

yea common sence allright thats why most people that are new to server makeing wouldnt know how to do this

item.title: Making an item unwearable to reg players [delta]
item.dc:creator: @jadz-pk jadz-pk
item.description:
@jadz-pk wrote:

ok vary simple guide

:guide: 2/10
files used: client.java

ok first find

if(wearID

look for something like this

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights < 2){ sM("narb why do you have a p ring!"); removeAllItems(); return false; }

this is a pring u can use this but my code deletes all items in invy when a non staff member trys to put on if u dont want thattake out the removeAllItems();

then add this below the }

if(wearID == item id && playerRights < 2){ sM("your message here"); return false; }

[code]if(wearID == item id &&  playerRights < 2){

this code makes a playerRights of 2 or higher required to wear this item

sM("your message here");

this sends a message that will be sent to the player trying to wear item with a players rights of 1 or lower

this can also be use with donator if your server has that just do the same thing and replace the playerRights with dotnator and the 2 with 1

for example

if(wearID == 17165 && donator < 1){ sM("you need to be a donator to wear this item"); return false; }

and compile and your done

Read full topic
